name: Bergische Universität Wuppertal
info: Founded in 1972, Bergische Universität Wuppertal is a modern university with a focus on research and practical education, offering a wide range of programs in engineering, humanities, and social sciences.

name: Technische Universität Hamburg (TUHH)
info: Technische Universität Hamburg (TUHH) is renowned for its focus on engineering and applied sciences, fostering innovation and entrepreneurship through its cutting-edge research and industry collaborations.

name: Justus Liebig University Giessen
info: Established in 1607, Justus Liebig University Giessen is known for its strong emphasis on life sciences, agriculture, and veterinary medicine, with significant contributions to research and teaching in these fields.

name: Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen
info: Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen is a historic institution founded in 1477, recognized for its research excellence in medicine, natural sciences, and the humanities.

name: Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz
info: Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz, founded in 1477, offers a wide range of academic disciplines, excelling in natural sciences and the humanities. It is also known for its research in social sciences and media.

name: Leibniz University Hannover
info: Leibniz University Hannover is one of the leading technical universities in Germany, offering programs in engineering, natural sciences, and social sciences, with a strong focus on interdisciplinary research.

name: University of Rostock
info: Founded in 1419, the University of Rostock is one of the oldest universities in Germany, known for its strong research programs in marine sciences, engineering, and medicine.

name: Universität Siegen
info: Universität Siegen is a research university with a focus on interdisciplinary education, offering programs in engineering, humanities, and social sciences.

name: Humboldt University of Berlin
info: Humboldt University of Berlin, founded in 1810, is renowned for its contributions to research and education in humanities, social sciences, and natural sciences, with a strong focus on academic excellence.

name: University of Hamburg
info: Founded in 1919, the University of Hamburg is one of Germany’s largest universities, offering a wide range of disciplines and excelling in research, particularly in the fields of climate science and public health.

name: University of Bonn
info: Founded in 1818, the University of Bonn is a leading institution known for its research programs in mathematics, economics, and natural sciences.

name: Philipps-Universität Marburg
info: Founded in 1527, Philipps-Universität Marburg is one of Germany’s oldest universities, renowned for its research and teaching in natural sciences and humanities.

name: Ruhr University Bochum (RUB)
info: RUB is one of Germany's largest research universities, excelling in engineering, natural sciences, and medicine.

name: University of Mannheim
info: Renowned for its business and economics programs, the University of Mannheim fosters close ties with the industry and international institutions.

name: University of Cologne
info: Founded in 1388, the University of Cologne is one of Europe's oldest universities, known for its academic strength in law, economics, and the social sciences.

name: University of Bayreuth
info: Founded in 1975, the University of Bayreuth is recognized for its interdisciplinary programs, particularly in law, economics, and African studies.

name: Albert-Ludwigs-Universität Freiburg
info: Albert-Ludwigs-Universität Freiburg, founded in 1457, is renowned for its research in natural sciences, engineering, and humanities.

name: University of Potsdam
info: The University of Potsdam is a modern institution with strong programs in the natural and social sciences, fostering international collaboration.

name: RWTH Aachen University
info: RWTH Aachen is one of Europe's leading universities in engineering and technology, driving innovation and industrial collaboration.

name: Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg (FAU)
info: Founded in 1743, FAU is one of Germany’s largest research universities, excelling in engineering, business, and medicine.

name: Freie Universität Berlin
info: Founded in 1948, Freie Universität Berlin is a leading research institution known for its strong programs in humanities and social sciences.

name: Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster
info: Founded in 1780, the University of Münster is a prominent public research university, renowned for its wide range of academic disciplines and strong research output.
